name: TapBoxing Game (Web Build)
description:
Tap Boxing RPG! The concept of this game is to fight through a gauntlet of enemies by constantly tapping (clicking) the upper portion of the screen to attack them. each enemy defeated gives you currency to upgrade your character for the next run through (the currency does not have a use in this version of the build however).

You can customize your characters abilities in the shop menu.

Abilities:

Shield - Halves Incoming Damage 

Stun - Breifly stops opponents movement and does minor damage

Dodge - Time this move with an oncoming attack from the opponent to avoid damage all together and receive some health back
